description: Physics domain validation rules and constraints

validation_rules.name: Gravity must point downward
validation_rules.description: Gravity force must have angle of 270° (downward)

validation_rules.name: Normal force perpendicular to surface
validation_rules.description: Normal force must be perpendicular to contact surface

validation_rules.name: Force balance check
validation_rules.description: Sum of forces should be near zero for equilibrium

validation_rules.name: Friction opposes motion
validation_rules.description: Friction force must oppose direction of motion/applied force

validation_rules.name: Friction magnitude limit
validation_rules.description: Friction force must not exceed μN (coefficient times normal force)

newton_laws.first_law: Object at rest or constant velocity => ΣF = 0
newton_laws.third_law: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction

force_relationships.normal_horizontal: N = W (for horizontal surface, no vertical forces)
force_relationships.normal_incline: N = W·cos(θ) (for incline at angle θ)

validation_rules.name: Incline angle range
validation_rules.description: Incline angle must be between 0° and 90°

validation_rules.name: Coordinate system aligned
validation_rules.description: Coordinate system should align with incline

validation_severity_levels.error: Diagram violates physics laws or fundamental constraints
validation_severity_levels.warning: Diagram may be incomplete or inconsistent
